title: Lesson II
description: Arthur’s LessonAfter a session with Will that leads to a physical altercation, Arthur knows his time at Boston College may be near its end. Will plans to tell things to the Head Dean if Arthur won’t agree to his demands. Perhaps Jasper and Ezra can help him.Jasper and Arthur’s LessonsWhen Ezra learns that Jasper has the same fantasy as him, he suggests that Arthur could help. A third in the mix might lead to new lessons and a HEA for all.Contains found family, age gap, Professor/student, a sweet Dom, poly, and a HEA.
author: Julie Mannino
